snippet: OGDEN--Elliott M.,Jr. The Georgica Association mourns the loss of our long time member and former president, Elliott M. Ogden, Jr. We send our condolences to his entire family. 1/3
lead_paragraph: OGDEN--Elliott M.,Jr. The Georgica Association mourns the loss of our long time member and former president, Elliott M. Ogden, Jr. We send our condolences to his entire family. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  OGDEN, ELLIOTT M.
